title: RIVEN SKIN
body: **PLEASE **someone tell me will dragon blade riven come back or champion ship i missed out buying dragon blade I'm so mad :/ ?{{champion:92}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

The Dragonblade Riven League of Legends skin is a legacy skin thatâ€™s no longer available for purchase through the ingame store.

However as a legacy skin it is possible they may re-release it in the future, however I cannot provide any information regarding when/if that could be.
